definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
extending all the way across/running all the way through
to disseminate/to give publicity to/propaganda/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pronounce a sentence (after a verdict in a court of law)
to read out loud to an audience/a prepared speech (e.g. to a party conference)
to proclaim/to make public or well known
to swear an oath (of office)/to make a vow
to drain (by leading off water)/to unburden oneself/to divulge/to leak a secret

Central Propaganda Section/abbr. for 中國共產黨中央委員會宣傳部|中国共产党中央委员会宣传部[Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4 Xuan1 chuan2 bu4]/Central Propaganda Department (of the Chinese communist party)

sentences.english: God and the congregation before the sun.
Xuan gave his ex-wife half of their property, and she got custody of their child.
sentences.chinese: 宣分给他的前妻一半财产，还把孩子的监护权给了她。

sentences.english: Pastor Chow prays for the team members.
sentences.chinese: 周牧师为短宣队员祈祷。

sentences.english: Derek is a missionary from Hong Kong who had served in Peru for 4 years.
sentences.chinese: 梁健民宣教士来自香港，在秘鲁宣教达四年之久。
为短宣训练的准备祷告。

sentences.english: Most mission agencies have age-appropriate short term projects.
sentences.chinese: 很多宣教机构都有适合不同年龄参加者的短宣计划。

sentences.english: The chief fermentation conditions of Chaenomeles speciosa S. Nakai wine were optimized by orthogonal experiments.
sentences.chinese: 对宣木瓜酒主发酵条件采用了正交实验法进行优化。

sentences.english: But a mountain rescued once again with Buddha slightly proclaimed.
sentences.chinese: 一山无奈用佛首又一次救了小宣。

sentences.english: Not many know about Sun Mi's past.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都不知道宣美的过去。

sentences.english: And In Jonah, He is the Great Foreign Missionary that takes the Word of God into all of the world.
sentences.chinese: 在约拿书，他是伟大的宣教士，把神的话带到万邦。

sentences.english: Missions Department coworker, Eddie Ho, introduces our Missions team members.
sentences.chinese: 宣道部同工何家声介绍我们的短宣队员。

sentences.english: Apprehend the quality guideline and actively perform promoting campaign to improve the efficiency of communication within the organization.
sentences.chinese: 理解质量方针并积极宣，为此提高组织内信息勾通。

sentences.english: One of the steps, beatification, requires at least one confirmed miracle.
sentences.chinese: 步骤之一，宣福礼，需要至少一个确实的奇迹。

definition: Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
second month of a season/middle/intermediate/second amongst brothers
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
